Problem 1(i)

\begin{align*} P(V=k) &= p(1-p)^{k-1}\\ G_V(z) &= E[z^V]\\ &= \sum_{k=1} ^\infty z^kp(1-p)^{k-1}\\ &= \frac{p}{1-p} \sum_{k=1} (z(1-p))^k\\ &= \frac{p …

Problem 1

Problem (i)

\begin{align*} F(x) &= P(X \leq x\\ &= \sum_{A} P(X \leq x, A)\\ &= P(X \leq x, A) + P(X \leq x, A^c)\\ &= P(X \leq x|A)P(A) + P(X \leq x|A^c)P(A^c)\\ &= F_1 …
